page.title: 04The South Downs Way
page.content: of obstacles,building stiles and bridges to make sure the public footpaths are kept open for people to walk along.They always keep to the Country Code which is: Fasten all gates. Keep your dogs under close control. Keep to public footpaths across farmland. Use gates and stiles to cross fences, hedges and walls. Leave livestock,crops and machinery. Take your litter home. Help to keep all water clean. Protect wildlife,plants and trees etc. Take special care on country roads. Make no unnecessary noise. Enjoy the countryside and respect it's life and work. Guard against all risk of fire. The Country Code is very important.You must always obey it.
